          <title>
            <string language="en">Plastic and aluminium as insulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plastik und Aluminium als Isolierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plastique et aluminium comme isolation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plástico e alumínio como a isolação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plastica ed alluminio come isolamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλαστικό και αλουμίνιο ως μόνωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plástico y aluminio como aislante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how to put a plastic insulator (first 2 illustrations) and an aluminium foil insulation (last 2 illustrations) in a drinking cup.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drinking cup</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie man eine 
Plastikisolierung (erste 2 Abbildungen) und eine 
Aluminiumfolieisolierung (letzte 2 Abbildungen) in ein trinkendes Cup 
einsetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment mettre un isolateur 
en plastique (2 premières illustrations) et une isolation de papier 
d'aluminium (2 dernières illustrations) dans une tasse potable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como pôr um isolador 
plástico (primeiras 2 ilustrações) e uma isolação da folha de 
alumínio (últimas 2 ilustrações) em um copo bebendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come mettere un isolante di 
plastica (prime 2 illustrazioni) e un alluminio sventa 
l'isolamento (ultime 2 illustrazioni) in una tazza bevente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς να βάλει έναν 
πλαστικό μονωτή (πρώτα 2 απεικονίσεις) και μια μόνωση φύλλων 
αλουμινίου αλουμινίου (στο τέλος 2 απεικονίσεις) σε ένα φλυτζάνι
κατανάλωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo poner un aislador 
plástico (primeras 2 ilustraciones) y un aislante del papel de 
aluminio (2 ilustraciones pasadas) en una taza que bebe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trinkendes Cup</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
